attributes.action: Increase British tariffs on all American imports.
attributes.additional_details: The Trump administration has imposed 10% tariffs on all UK good and items, with 25% on cars, steel and aluminium, affecting citizens of both countries heavily and unfairly. By retaliating with higher tariffs, we can stand up to oppressive impositions while reducing reliance on an overreaching regime.
attributes.background: We should retaliate the unfair tariff increases from America with higher tariffs on all American goods to stand up to injustice, while setting precedence for fellow countries to join us in opposition.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/722342
